repos.description: Distributed transaction solution in micro-service base on eventually consistency, also an eventbus with Outbox pattern
A library to implement the transactional outbox pattern for PostgreSQL, a message broker or event stream, and TypeScript.
a Change Data Capture (CDC) system using Outbox Pattern with Postgres WAL, Redis Streams and gRPC
Event-Driven Architecture for a microservices-based system with a clean architecture + Domain Driven Design (DDD) + CQRS pattern + Saga pattern + Outbox pattern + CDC.
Microservices data exchange with change data capture and outbox pattern.

Kafka delivery semantics in the case of failure depend on how and when offsets are stored. Spark output operations are at-least-once. So if you want the equivalent of exactly-once semantics, you must either store offsets after an idempotent output, or store offsets in an atomic transaction alongside output.There is Spark Streaming how to store Kafka topic offset with HBase.
